text: Tommy Albert Blom (3 March 1947 - 25 May 2014) was a Swedish singer and radio host. He was member of the band Tages in the 1960s. He hosted Vinyl 107 from the mid-1990s until 2008, when he lost that job because of age. He returned to Vinyl 107 in 2011. He was born in Gothenburg. He died from cancer on 25 May 2014 in Stockholm, at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Singers from Gothenburg Category:Swedish radio personalities
title: Tommy Blom
